{{Projects}}:
RIZQ.AI: Built RIZQ.AI, an intelligent job automation platform that helps professionals apply to multiple jobs effortlessly. The platform uses advanced AI technology to create personalized resumes for each job application and handles bulk job applications automatically while staying completely Out for time consuming process.

LUMMA.ai: I'm currently dedicated to building a revolutionary AI platform that will directly compete with ChatGPT, Grok, Gemini, and Perplexity. This breakthrough technology represents a fundamental shift in conversational AI capabilities.

Working intensively on this groundbreaking project, I'm coordinating every aspect of development to ensure we deliver something truly transformative to the market. This isn't just another AI tool - it's designed to redefine industry standards.
